front.title: LDP Extensions for Leaf-initiated Point-to-Multipoint Pseudowire

abstract.t: This document provides a solution to extend LDP signaling in order to allow set up and maintenance of Point-to-Multipoint Pseudowire (P2MP PW). Such an extension of existing point to point Pseudowire is made necessary by new applications. The document deals with the leaf- initiated P2MP PW setup and maintenance. The processing for setting up a P2MP MS-PW is built on the processing for setting up a P2MP LSP with LDP.
